languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text:
Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} выбирает зону стратегического плана. В начале следующего хода великого стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП великого стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
The Strategist chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an additional turn with 1 AP and 2 MP at the start of the Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to maximum 3) and MP by +2 (up to maximum 6).
The Strategist's MP is reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片战斗策略区域。该区域内所有盟友在战略大师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
该片战斗区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。
然而，战略大师的移动点数会降低至1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。该区域内所有盟友在战略大师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
该片战斗区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数提高1点（最多3点），获得的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}提高2点（最多6点）。
然而，战略大师的移动点数会降至1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Todos los aliados en esa zona ganan un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra {/g}con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al comienzo del próximo turno del gran estratega.
Por cada enemigo que se haya abatido en la zona de Tácticas de combate seleccionada, los PA otorgados aumentan en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y los PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6).
Los PM del gran estratega se reducen a 1 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
El gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Todos los aliados en esa zona ganan un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adicional con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al comienzo del próximo turno del gran estratega.
Por cada enemigo que se haya eliminado en la zona de Tácticas de combate seleccionada, los PA otorgados aumentan en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y los PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6).
Los PM del gran estratega se reducen a 1 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は戦術範囲をひとつ選択する。戦術範囲内の仲間全員が、軍師の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が付与される{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
選択した戦術範囲内で敵を倒すたび、この付与APは +1 (最大3まで)、付与MPは +2 (最大6まで)増加する。
軍師のMPは戦闘終了まで１減少する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
軍師は戦術範囲をひとつ選択する。戦術範囲内の仲間全員が、軍師の次のターン開始時に1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が付与される追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得する。
選択した戦術範囲内で敵を倒すたび、この付与APは +1 (最大3まで)、付与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}MP{/g}は +2 (最大6まで)増加する。
軍師のMPは戦闘終了まで１減少する。

В начале следующего хода великого стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП великого стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
Стратег выбирает зону стратегического плана. В начале следующего хода стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает дополнительный ход с 1 ОД и 2 ОП.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

Стратег выбирает зону стратегического плана. В начале следующего хода стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает дополнительный ход с 1 ОД и 2 ОП.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet aus. Jeder Verbündete in diesem Gebiet erhält zu Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Großstrategen einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Für jeden Feind, der im ausgewählten Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet getötet wurde, werden diese AP um +1 erhöht (bis maximal 3) und die BP um +2 (bis maximal 6).
Die BP des Großstrategen werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes auf 1 reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet aus. Jeder Verbündete in diesem Gebiet erhält zu Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Großstrategen einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Für jeden Feind, der im ausgewählten Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet getötet wurde, werden diese AP um +1 erhöht (bis maximal 3) und die BP um +2 (bis maximal 6).
Die BP des Großstrategen werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes um 1 reduziert.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} choisit une zone de tactiques de combat. Chaque allié présent dans cette zone bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début du tour suivant du grand stratège.
Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone de Tactiques de combat sélectionnée, il obtient également +1 PA (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et +2 PD (jusqu'à un maximum de 6).
Les PD du grand stratège sont réduits à 1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Le Stratège choisit une zone de tactiques de combat. Chaque allié présent dans cette zone bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début du tour suivant du Stratège.
Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone de tactiques de combat sélectionnée, il obtient également +1 PA (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PD{/g} (jusqu'à un maximum de 6).
Les PD du Stratège sont réduits à 1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, bir çatışma taktikleri alanı seçer. O alandaki her dost birim, Büyük Stratejist'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır.
Seçilen çatışma taktikleri alanında öldürülen her düşman için bu EP +1 (maksimum 3), HP ise +2 (maksimum 6) artar.
Büyük Stratejist'in HP'si 1'e düşer ve bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.
